headline: Nextech3d AI Corp (NEXCF) Q3 2025 Earnings Call Highlights: Record Growth and Strategic Expansions
summary: Nextech3d AI Corp (NEXCF) reports impressive revenue growth and gross margins, while expanding its service offerings through strategic acquisitions.

headline: Meta Slashes Employee Equity For Second Year As Mark Zuckerberg-Led Tech Giant Gears Up To Fund Mega $135 Billion 'Superintelligence' Infrastructure
summary: Meta Platforms Inc. (NASDAQ:META) has reduced annual stock awards for the majority of its workforce by approximately 5%, marking the second consecutive year of equity cuts as the company reallocates billions toward Artificial Intelligence. Funding The AI Arms Race The move of slashing stock awards comes as CEO Mark Zuckerberg prepares for a massive infrastructure expansion, with 2026 capital expenditure projected to reach a record-high range of $115 billion to $135 billion.
